title: Skilled fingers
creator_contributor_role: National Film Board of Canada, production company

Crafts & Visual Arts/Arts and crafts movement
description: Pleasure in Pots: The Deichmann's family pottery in Sussex, New Brunswick, is shown. Sweater Specialists: Indian women of Cowichan, British Columbia, knit sweaters for outdoorsmen. Garden of Buildings: On his estate in Prince Edward Island, Lt. Col. E.W. Johnstone builds scale model replicas of famous castles and cathedrals.
